actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assess sanitation and safety conditions at Bureau of Indian Affairs facilities that were constructed to provide treaty tribes access to traditional fishing grounds and expend funds on construction of facilities and structures to improve those conditions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Columbia River In-Lieu and Treaty Fishing Access Sites Improvement Act

titles.title: Columbia River In-Lieu and Treaty Fishing Access Sites Improvement Act

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assess sanitation and safety conditions at Bureau of Indian Affairs facilities that were constructed to provide treaty tribes access to traditional fishing grounds and expend funds on construction of facilities and structures to improve those conditions, and for other purposes.
Columbia River In-Lieu and Treaty Fishing Access Sites Improvement Act
